remarks:
Existence of negative of real number.  Axiom 15 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory.  This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly; instead, use ~ ax-rnegex .  (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.) 

---

 Existence of negative of real number.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, derived from set theory.  This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly; instead, use ~ ax-rnegex . (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1996.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
axrnegex $p |- ( A e. RR -> E. x e. RR ( A + x ) = 0 ) $.
$d A x $.
